name: Codename 7
description:
Codename 7 is a space shooter game made with libgdx.

It's also my first game ever made!

All the assets used in this game are available at https://opengameart.org/

You have 3 types of enemies:

Gunners: They are the only enemies that can shoot projectiles at you, they also give you 100 points if killed

Meteorites: they are the easiest enemies to kill in the game, one hit and you basically destroy them, they also give you only 5 points when killed

Kamikazes: those are the hardest enemies in the game, you can't kill them, you can only try to avoid them, if a kamikaze ship hits you, you are essencially dead, they also make a noisy sound when they spawn.

Controls:

- You move using the arrow keys of your keyboard

- Space bar fires the shots

The game is currently available only in brazilian portuguese, but i will leave the translation of the words in the game below:

"Jogar de novo" means play again

"Voltar ao menu" means back to main menu

"Pontos" means points

"Recorde" means your high score

"Jogar" means play

"Sair" means quit the game
